name: Alliance Professionnelle des Agents Commerciaux
goal:
Our Professional Organization represents and defends the interests of the French Commercial Agency in our Territory, but also internationally, which brings together more than 600.000 companies in the World.
These Commercial Agencies are SME specialized in Commercial Marketing. Present in all sectors of the economy, they contribute to the growth of Manufacturers who wish to develop their sales.
Our profession represents 25.000 companies, more than 52.000 professionals and
3 billion 500 million euros in turnover.
Our members work as well in the marketing of everyday products as high technology products. 40% of the agents represent at least 1 EU-foreign principal.
Commercial Agencies.
APAC is member of Internationnaly United Commercial Agents and Brokers (IUCAB).
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All files about trade, commercial agency, distribution, competition, vertical agreement.
